CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Audio response strength (X: bass level, Y: bass hits)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Audio response curve (higher = more intense reaction)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_pow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Rotation on beat (X: linear by distance, Y: quadratic by distance)
CONTROLS.NAME: twist_beat

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Zoom pulse on beat (X: linear by distance, Y: quadratic by distance)
CONTROLS.NAME: zoom_beat

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Brightness boost on bass hits (0 = none, 1 = double)
CONTROLS.NAME: fade_beat

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Animation speed (X: time-based, Y: bass time-based)
CONTROLS.NAME: speed_control

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Continuous rotation speed of the fractal
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_speed

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Color phase offsets (shifts hue of lightning patterns)
CONTROLS.NAME: color_control

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Color inversion amount (0 = normal, 1 = fully inverted)
CONTROLS.NAME: invert_color

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Motion blur distance range (X: start fade, Y: full blur)
CONTROLS.NAME: motion_blur_limits

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Motion blur strength (X: at center, Y: at edges)
CONTROLS.NAME: motion_blur_intensity

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Fractal viewport center (X: horizontal, Y: vertical offset)
CONTROLS.NAME: zoom_center

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Zoom level (X: base magnification, Y: breathing pulse depth)
CONTROLS.NAME: zoom_factor

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mandelbrot C constant (real and imaginary components)
CONTROLS.NAME: initial_c

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: C parameter rotation (X: speed multiplier, Y: sine frequency)
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_c

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media distortion (X: warp strength, Y: frequency modulation)
CONTROLS.NAME: media_warp

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media multiplier – boost opacity for bold color effects
CONTROLS.NAME: media_multiplier

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media opacity – fade visuals in or out
CONTROLS.NAME: media_opacity

DESCRIPTION: Experience the Electric Mandelbrot—a hypnotic fractal that spins and breathes with electric energy. Brilliant lightning spokes radiate from the spiraling core, creating a cosmic wheel of light that pulses and rotates to the music. The fractal morphs through vibrant color gradients while motion blur trails create an ethereal, dreamlike quality at the edges. Audio-reactive elements make every bass hit twist the geometry and intensify the glow, while the continuously evolving C parameter ensures the pattern never repeats exactly. Perfect for trance, psytrance, and ambient electronic music visualizations.
TITLE: Electric mandelbrot
